title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
description: Create a responsive website using HTML5 and CSS3. Must include semantic HTML, CSS Grid/Flexbox, and mobile-first design.

title: JavaScript Interactive Features
description: Add interactive features to your website using vanilla JavaScript. Include DOM manipulation, event handling, and form validation.

title: React Component Development
description: Build a React application with multiple components. Implement props, state, and event handling.

title: State Management with Redux
description: Implement Redux for state management in your React application. Include CRUD operations and proper state flow.

title: Software Requirements Analysis
description: Analyze software requirements for a given project. Create user stories, use cases, and requirement specifications.

title: System Design Document
description: Design a software system architecture. Include UML diagrams, database schema, and API specifications.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design a normalized database schema for an e-commerce application. Include ERD and table definitions.

title: Advanced SQL Queries
description: Write complex SQL queries including joins, subqueries, window functions, and stored procedures.
